library(tidyverse)

theme_set(theme_bw())

# Read data

- Data source: `Globally averaged marine surface annual mean data` from [ESRL-NOAA](https://www.esrl.noaa.gov/gmd/ccgg/trends/gl_data.html)

```{r read_atm_co2}

co2_atm <- read_table2(here::here("data/pCO2_atmosphere",
                              "co2_annmean_gl.txt"),
                   col_names = FALSE, comment = "#")

co2_atm <- co2_atm %>% 
  select(-X3)

names(co2_atm) <- c("year", "pCO2")
  
  
```

# Time series

```{r co2_atm_time_series}

co2_atm %>% 
  ggplot(aes(year, pCO2))+
  geom_path()+
  geom_point()

```

# Write clean file


```{r write_co2_atm_clean_file}

co2_atm %>% 
  write_csv(here::here("data/pCO2_atmosphere/_summarized_data_files",
                       "co2_atm.csv"))

rm(co2_atm)

```
